contents:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 23rd day of April, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted with oral argument, but limited to whether the Terry frisk was justified, and if the Supreme Court’s decision in Minnesota v. Dickerson, 508 U.S. 366, 113 S.Ct. 2130, 124 L.Ed.2d 334 (1993) is consistent with Article I, Section 8 of Pennsylvania’s Constitution.
